document.masterDocTitle: New records of Phylinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae) from the Palaearctic Region

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New records of Phylinae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae) from the Palaearctic Region

subSubSection.paragraph: Known from Siberia, Russian Far East, and Korea . New for Mongolia .
